<b>Signature:</b>


## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [persistenceKey?](./studio._studioinitializeopts.persistencekey.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The local storage key to use to persist the state.<!-- -->Default: "theatrejs:0.4" |
|  [usePersistentStorage?](./studio._studioinitializeopts.usepersistentstorage.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether to persist the changes in the browser's temporary storage. It is useful to set this to false in the test environment or when debugging things.<!-- -->Default: true |
